nodes.text: The Starbreeze was the personal shuttle of Colonel Laren Omas of the Republic Army's Special Forces Division during the Great Galactic War.

In 3665 BBY, Omas and the Starbreeze were shot down over the planet Hoth during the Battle of Hoth. Admiral Layek Davos discovered the shuttle and hid in the shuttle bay of the Star of Coruscant after filling it with riches, as a retirement plan. In 3642 BBY he returned to Hoth and allied himself with White Maw pirates to retrieve the shuttle. At the same time Ardun Kothe ordered Cipher Nine to retrieve the shuttle, which Cipher accomplished, beating both pirates and the Admiral to it. Kothe needed the ship to later gain access to the Shadow Arsenal.
